name: Sky Racer NO Limit - Sky Simulator
name_original: Sky Racer NO Limit - Sky Simulator
description:
Sky Racer NO Limit

Drive beyond the fences! Start racing right away. No need to login and create a profile. Just pure rally racing fun.
CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR
You begin by customizing you rally car. Choose the color combo that makes you feel fast.
Are you ready to challenge the best drivers of Real Racing Game?
The time of each race is recorded.
Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking!
So you can compete with players around the World! Speedily dash your extreme car through spiked gates and vicious obstacles for survival.Join the rush of an adrenaline rising in this amazing Extreme Car Racing Adventure!

key Features :

=> Impressive HD Graphics
=> 2 Game Modes: Time Trial, Endless
=> Easy to Control
=> Enjoy games with free download
